demo.name: brd2710a.demo.bt_rail_soc_energy_harvesting_sensor
demo.label: Bluetooth RAIL- SoC Energy Harvesting Sensor
demo.description: This example uses a Dual Harvester Shield with a lithium capacitor and a photovoltaic cell to demonstrate a self-powered sensor device. This example is implemented in RAIL compatible with BLE.

property.value: Bluetooth RAIL- SoC Energy Harvesting Sensor
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.name: brd2710a.demo.bt_soc_energy_harvesting_sensor
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Energy Harvesting Sensor
demo.description: This example uses a Dual Harvester Shield with a lithium capacitor as the storage element and a photovoltaic cell as the power source to demonstrate a self-powered BLE sensor device.

property.value: Bluetooth - SoC Energy Harvesting Sensor
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.name: brd2710a.demo.bt_rail_soc_energy_harvesting_kinetic_switch
demo.label: Bluetooth RAIL - SoC Energy Harvesting Kinetic Switch
demo.description: This example uses a Kinetic Harvester Shield to demonstrate a self-powered switch device. This example is implemented in RAIL compatible with BLE.

demo.name: brd2703a.demo.bt_soc_energy_harvesting_application_observer
demo.label: Bluetooth - SoC Energy Harvesting Application Observer
demo.description: This example implements an Observer device for Bluetooth Energy Harvesting examples. It scans and analyzes advertisement packets from Energy Harvesting switch/sensor devices, providing sender information via UART.

property.value: Bluetooth - SoC Energy Harvesting Application Observer
Device\ Type|SoC Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth

demo.name: brd2710a.demo.zigbee_gpd_soc_energy_harvesting_switch
demo.label: Zigbee GPD - SoC Energy Harvesting Switch
demo.description: This is a Green Power Device that pairs with a GP Combo or Sink device and sends gpd toggling GPDF by pushing Kinetic Switch. This demo scans channel 11, 15, 20, 25 during commissioning only.

property.value: Zigbee GPD - SoC Energy Harvesting Switch

demo.name: brd2703a.demo.zigbee_gpc_soc_energy_harvesting_observer
demo.label: Zigbee GPC - SoC Energy Harvesting Observer
demo.description: This device is a Zigbee 3.0 light application with Green Power endpoint, Green Power Proxy and Sink functionality design for observing the entergy harvesting GPD.
